# Raffle Studio Assets

This directory contains images and assets for the Raffle Studio landing page.

## Directory Structure

- `hero/` - Images for the hero section (app mockups, screenshots)
- `features/` - Images showcasing app features and capabilities  
- `guide/` - Screenshots for the step-by-step guide page

## Image Guidelines

- Use WebP format for better compression
- Maintain responsive image sets (1x, 2x)
- Keep file sizes under 200KB per image
- Use alt text for accessibility

## Placeholder Images

Currently using CSS-based mockups. Replace with actual app screenshots:

1. `hero/app-mockup.png` - Main app interface
2. `guide/screen1.png` - Design Creation screen
3. `guide/screen2.png` - Print Preview screen
